meaning_str.bing:
n. 草莓
网络. 士多啤梨；草莓味；草莓女人

士多啤梨；草莓味；草莓女人

草莓；草莓植株；草莓色；淡红色

1.en: I've got a variety of flavors for you to choose from. I've got strawberry, peach, chocolate, coffee, vanilla and praline.
1.cn: 我这有好多口味让你挑，有草莓的、桃的、巧克力的、咖啡的、香草的，还有果仁的。

2.en: Tim was sitting on the floor with the empty box. His mouth was red and he had strawberry juice all over his face.
2.cn: 这时蒂姆正拿着空盒子坐在地上。他的嘴是红的，满脸都是草莓汁。

3.en: Perhaps it was the Saturday when the big strawberry wore a daisy hat that I began to think, how can I top this?
3.cn: 或许是在那个星期六，在大草莓上放雏菊做帽子之后，我开始在想：我怎么才能够超过它？

0.en: Eh, strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, banana. With strawberry please.
0.cn: 额，草莓，香草，巧克力，香蕉。加点草莓。

1.en: George likes strawberries the best. Strawberry. George loves strawberries.
1.cn: 乔治最喜欢草莓。草莓。乔治喜欢草莓。

2.en: This seed will grow into a lovely strawberry plant.
2.cn: 这颗种子会长成一株漂亮的草莓。

3.en: Would you like to plant a strawberry seed? Yes, please!
3.cn: 你想种一颗草莓种子吗？是的，愿意！

4.en: Strawberry. Oh, it's melted. How about ice-cream soup, instead?
4.cn: 草莓。噢，它化了。换成冰淇淋汤怎么样？

5.en: I love jelly. I love sandwiches. Strawberry. They've forgotten me.
5.cn: 我喜欢果冻。我喜欢三明治。草莓！他们已经把我忘记了。

6.en: Would you like to plant a strawberry seed? Yes, please. This seed will grow into a lovely strawberry plant.
6.cn: 你想不想种一粒草莓种子？是的，我想！到时候这里种子会长出一颗可爱的草莓苗。

7.en: Would you like to plant a strawberry seed? Yes, please! This seed will grow into a lovely strawberry plant.
7.cn: 你想不想种一粒草莓种子？是的，我想！到时候这里种子会长出一颗可爱的草莓苗。

8.en: Can I have a cherry ice-cream? Strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, banana. With pistachio and strawberry please.
8.cn: 能给我来一个樱桃味的冰淇淋吗。额，这个是草莓，这个是香草，这个是巧克力，这个是香蕉。请在我的上面加上开心果和草莓。

9.en: Can I have a cherry ice-cream? Strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, banana. With pistachio and strawberry please.
9.cn: 能给我来一个樱桃味的冰淇淋吗？额，这个是草莓，这个是香草，这个是巧克力，这个是香蕉。请在我的上面加上开心果和草莓。

10.en: And we will have strawberries! Yes. Come on, Peppa. Bye bye, Grandpa. Bye bye, strawberry.
10.cn: 我们也会有草莓！是的。快点，佩佩。再见，爷爷。再见，草莓。

11.en: Bye bye, Grandpa. Bye bye, strawberry. Grandpa Pig looks after Peppa's strawberry plant. After many days, Grandpa Pig finds a tiny plant growing.
11.cn: 爷爷，再见了。再见了，我的草莓。猪爷爷把佩琪照顾她的草莓。过了一段时间，猪爷爷发现长出了一株小小的植物。

12.en: It's time to go home. But we're waiting for my strawberry plant to grow. I wanted strawberries for teas.
12.cn: 时间到了回家吧。但是我们在等着我的草莓发芽！我还想用草莓来泡茶呢。

13.en: Peppa! George! It's time to go home. But we're waiting for my strawberry plant to grow! I wanted strawberries for teas.
13.cn: 佩佩！乔治！该回家了。但是我们在等我的草莓长大！我想喝草莓茶。

14.en: Peppa! George! It's time to go home. But we're waiting for my strawberry plant to grow! I wanted strawberries for teas.
14.cn: 佩琪！乔治！时间到了回家吧。但是我们在等着我的草莓发芽！我还想用草莓来泡茶呢。

15.en: I'd say strawberry jelly. That's right. Mr Fox loves smelling things.
15.cn: 我猜是草莓果冻吧。你答对了。狐狸先生最喜欢闻气味。

16.en: I'd say strawberry jelly. That's right. Mr Fox loves smelling things.
16.cn: 我猜是草莓果冻吧。你答对了。狐狸先生最喜欢闻气味。

17.en: May I offer you something to drink? You know I don't drink. Not even strawberry Quik?
17.cn: 我给你倒点饮料喝吧？你知道我不喝饮料。这个也不喝吗？草莓速溶奶？

18.en: You lot again. Peppa told you; there's no more bread. Mummy, we do have strawberry cake.
18.cn: 又是你们啊，佩琪说过了，已经没有面包了。妈妈，我们不是还有一点草莓蛋糕吗？

19.en: You lot again. Peppa told you; there's no more bread. Mummy, we do have strawberry cake.
19.cn: 又是你们啊，佩奇说过了，已经没有面包了。妈妈，我们不是还有一点草莓蛋糕吗？
